definition: Weixin or WeChat (mobile text and voice messaging service developed by Tencent 騰訊|腾讯[Teng2 xun4])
surname Wei/ancient Chinese state near present day Chongqing/Taiwan pr. [Wei2]
letter/mail/CL:封[feng1]/to trust/to believe/to profess faith in/truthful/confidence/trust/at will/at random

sentences.english: The 2015 Spring Festival marked the coming of digital red packets on WeChat.
sentences.chinese: 2015年春节时，微信迎来了数字红包。

sentences.english: And if the propagation mechanism of WeChat can guide the public opinion?
sentences.chinese: 微信的传播机制是否能够实现舆论引导工作？

sentences.english: I've lived in Shanghai for 10 years, and yeah, Wechat is a game changer.
sentences.chinese: 我在上海住了十多年，微信确实是个规则改变者。

sentences.english: Li sighed - this was the last message she wanted to receive.
sentences.chinese: 李红艳叹了口气，这是她最不想收到的微信。

sentences.english: 1, Responsible for E-commerce shop network platform operating working.
sentences.chinese: 负责公司天猫京东微信商城网络平台运营工作。

sentences.english: Do you usually grab red envelop on WeChat?
sentences.chinese: 你有没有经常在微信上抢红包？

sentences.english: They currently have more than 400 regular clients on WeChat.
sentences.chinese: 我们现在已通过微信朋友圈发展客户400余人。

sentences.english: Li has been using WeChat to facilitate communication with her students.
sentences.chinese: 李老师使用微信，是为了更方便地与学生交流。

definition: to scan a QR code or barcode
money wrapped in red as a gift/bonus payment/kickback/bribe
Moments (social networking function of smartphone app WeChat 微信[Wei1 xin4])
private correspondence/personal letter/(computing) personal message (PM)/to message sb
to transfer (money to a bank account)
